item.title: Bopis
item.description: Pork innards braised in vinegar and spices INGREDIENTS 1⁄2 kg. lungs & 1⁄2 kg. liver, finely chopped (pork or beef) 3 gloves garlic 1 big onion 1 cup radish, julienned cooking oil vinegar, salt and black pepper to taste
